list.title: Learn basic html, css, javascript to create blog
list.description: Learn the basic of html, css, javascript to create blog, then start learning web design, create template and others.

list.title: Fresh graduated as a computer & networking engineer
list.description: After 3 years of hard work, learning and practicing, I finally graduated from vocational high school of Negeri Bali Mandara. I was so proud of myself.

list.title: Become junior software engineer @dimata
list.description: After graduated, joining the awesome team to create and maintain software for business and goverment at Dimata. Responsible to maintain the sites, codebase, create new apps, redesign apps.

list.title: Promoted as a senior software engineer
list.description: After 2 years of hard work, time to promoted as a senior software engineer. Responsible to redesign the apps, create microservices, integrate api, collab with designers, and create a design system for the company.

list.title: Start freelance as a fullstack developer
list.description: It's my turn time to start all of my career as freelancer. I resign to @dimata and start the journey.

title: 2024: Good actions start with good thoughts

list.title: Create web design business
list.description: With all of the experience and knowledge, I create a web design business at Weebo. I'm so excited to start this new journey.

list.title: Create tiny resource for developer
list.description: A collection tools, library, or resources for developers that i have created to support the workflows and development process. Also a place to create another librray, ui, types and so on. Explore your utils at Weecraft.

list.title: Create software business
list.description: Tried to explore, and start create my own software business. This is my first step to create my own software business.

list.title: Launching brook code theme
list.description: Create simple and elegant code editor theme that support vscode, zed and others, comes with simplicity for developers.

list.title: Create website for Guna Transport
list.description: Creat official website for Guna Transport, a new transportation company that is going to be launched in 2025.

list.description: Redesign the weebo website with new clean and simple look website concept. Allow the audiences and clients focus on the main goal of the website.
